metadata.title: CVE-2017-9434 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Crypto++ (aka cryptopp) through 5.6.5 contains an out-of-bounds readvulnerability in zinflate.cpp in the Inflator filter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9434` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcrypto++-utils - 5.6.1-9ubuntu0.1+esm1
libcrypto++9v5 - 5.6.1-9ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libcrypto++ package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.6.1-9ubuntu0.1+esm1').
